content: This time around is more learning, less posting for me  but just want to drop this one.   Most of you are already familiar with this, many of Una don hear of those Moni platform make you deposit certain amount of money to get bigger amounts later.    For example dem go say make you deposit 10k to get 20k.And many pipo don fall as victims some  even go further to invest their school fees and house rent on d Moni platform wey go later crash with their  cash. Which have lead to alot of frustrations and sometimes losses of lives (suicide). Dem go pay for  certain periods of time to ginger pipo to invest more as dey invest dem go just closed the platform.    Why don't invest on Bitcoin, normally risk dey too we know! But that Moni platform Naim dey risky pass by far. Just jewelry buy your Btc store am for your paper wallet. Hold am for long because in a long run your profit sure and you'll be in a safer side.  Conclusions  : Please try your best to stay away from such scam projects  if you know you are having the mindset of investing in such, please remove such mindset Bcus the time e go burst customer care nor go answer you dem go run with your hard earn funds.

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: The truth is any body that falls for this kind of scam are naive and greedy soul and most of us have had our share of such scam before waking up to reality that all that glitters is not gold buying and HODLing bitcoin is better than many investment plans though there are risk involves but the gains is far more. Also secured way of saving bitcoin is not only the use of paper wallet which has some risk of losing bitcoin and so much investors opt for hardware wallet which is currently the safest and having lesser risk of coin lost but in general you need to save your coins in a non-custodial wallet even if you are using desktop or mobile device avoid custodian wallets and Centralise Exchanges (not your keys not your wallet) . Some best bitcoin wallet for mobile and desktop devices are : Bluewallet, Wasabi wallet, Electrum and some others

I think wetting dey cause that thing na greediness or playing smart in the wrong direction. Those platform wey dey do all those things have the motive of defrauding people and Dem get time frame and e no dey pass 1 or 2 months. And if you wan make money from them na just the first time wey them go come wey Dem they find customer wey you go fit chop them, but when e don dey pass one month just comot your money because na go e don dey go. No be say I dey advice people on wetting no nice but I dey talk base on expirence. Because you fit take advantage of any opportunity be it good or bad depending on how smart you are. Those people just be like some memecoin wey Dem launch e go pump for sometimes come dump and na early investors go make money comot hand while late investors go fall victim.The advice I fit give people be say there is no free money anywhere. Because where and how ona think say them dey make there money wey you go invest 10k get 20k so when you see that kind offer, just run for safety except you wan try luck. One thing wey dey baffle me na how people dey ignorant to the extent of falling victim of ponzy scheme countless time. After mmm don come many other come but people dey always fall victim all because them wan make quick money. The funny part be say some wey get money for bitcoin go sell am go invest for ponzy scheme they think say them go make quick money not ontil there money go dey traped before there eye go open. So make we dey always dey careful for investment we dey do because get rich quick scheme dey be like say na juju them dey use, where as na our greediness naim dey push us enter even say we know say e fit crash.

comments.body: Na greed they make people dey go invest their hard earned money in those platforms. Sometimes I feel like lack of knowledge too dey cause all these things. Also the desire to get rich overnight is what makes lots of people involves themselves with these investment platforms that always crash. But one thing I have discovered is that most people have money to invest but lacks the opportunity on where to invest it. Not everyone is privileged to know Bitcoin investment as you and I does. Am sure no member of this Lb can fall victim of those platforms after the knowledge we are getting here everyday. The best way we can help some people is by sharing the knowledge we have with them and tell them to stay away from those ponzi schemes. We can tell them about Bitcoin and if they like the idea they can invest on it willingly without you forcing them.

Just jewelry buy your Btc store am for your paper wallet. Hold am for long because in a long run your profit sure and you'll be in a safer side. Bitcoin is also seen as a risky investment by some people but what differs it from all those money making platforms that ask you to deposit and get double of your amount is that it is decentralized and you’re the owner and holder of your own money. No any third party can come in between you both unless you let it lose and allow someone to have access to your money that you’ve saved in bitcoin. Bitcoin is different from all of them and it is better to invest in bitcoin that invest in them.
